name: DYSTOPIA ©
description: 🧱💀🎱🔥🚓😈💣 5505px x 5925px | By Your Neighbourhood Homie, Yung $lice.  In Brazil, their is a common expression “Cidadão de Bem” (The Good Citizen). Quite the contrary, these are not good people, it’s a denomination used to exclude and silence minorities, rebels and anyone they judge not worthy in society. The current leader of this mindset is the president, a psycho sociopath genocidal “Good Citizen” with authoritarian wishes and an eugenicist agenda. This artwork is a reflection of the dystopia Brazil currently resides in.
